Text: the exercise files aren't working past chapter 3...is this a problem for anyone else?
Yes for me as well...the exercise files aren't working past chapter 3... does anyone know how to fix????

sorted! you just have to manually search for the folder after chapter 3. Manually search for chapter 4 in FCP7 and it will open up. This training DVD is amazing! use daemon tools on windows to open the .iso file and watch the dvd. goto http://www.daemon-tools.cc/eng/downloads

you dont need to burn it onto a dvd
